name: Career Website
detailedDescription: Designed and developed a professional portfolio website to showcase my projects, skills, and experiences in a clean, interactive format. Built with Next.js for server-side rendering and Tailwind CSS for modern, responsive styling, the site features dynamically loaded projects directly from GitHub using REST APIs, ensuring it always stays up to date. Integrated animated skill dropdowns, interactive project modals, and cross-linked technologies for a seamless user experience. Employed Framer Motion to create smooth animations and transitions between sections, enhancing visual appeal and usability. Deployed the site on Vercel for fast global delivery and continuous integration for the auto-loading features from GitHub. This project demonstrates advanced frontend engineering, clean component architecture, and a focus on recruiter-friendly design.
features: Dynamic project automated loading from GitHub
Interactive project modals and skill links
